mapper.select: SELECT cm_id, cm_name, cm_att1, cm_att2, cm_att3, cm_att4, cm_desc FROM common where cm_id like 'PS%'
SELECT cm_id, cm_name, cm_att1, cm_att2, cm_att3, cm_att4, cm_desc FROM common where cm_id like 'IG%'
SELECT cm_id, cm_name, cm_att1, cm_att2, cm_att3, cm_att4, cm_desc FROM common where cm_id like 'II%'
